title: LeaverBuster
body: I'm tired of the leaverbuster and its been a year since ive played and its still here I don't know how to turn it off please someone help me its driving me and my group of friends insane!

replies.body: You can't turn off leaverbuster, if you keep getting low priority queues it means you are frequently leaving or afking in games.  The only way to get rid of it is to play through the games.

This is correct. Because leaving a match negatively affects everyone in the match, regardless of the reason for the leave, the [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all leaves equally. It's also one of the reasons why Leaverbuster penalties cannot be modified or removed. 

The most common reason frequent disconnections happen is due to an unstable connection to the servers. You can find the most common solutions for this on our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Let me know if this helped.
